## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_OFFSET" property

Emitted when the offset of the particle emitter is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_OFFSET]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        offset: Vector3Like;
    };
```
